channel.title: Cache from :C// drive back to client map
channel.description:
hey i got a problem i want it that the server read the cache in the client map
cuz it only read the cache in :C// drive players have to put that cache in :C// drive theirselves
so if anyone can help me make it that when u start client it download cache and put in :C// or make it it read it out of client map
i will be very thankfull
